channel.title: Stickers on N Design Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Stickers on N Design Studio

item.title: Order your custom stickers today.
item.description:
This is Nemah of NDesignstudio the author of this blog: Here is my today’s message:

Elevate your brand, personalize your belongings, or add a unique touch to your gifts with our custom sticker prints! Designed with creativity and crafted with care, each sticker is printed at home using high-quality materials and meticulously hand-cut to ensure precision and attention to detail. Whether you’re looking to promote your business, express your individuality, or create something truly one-of-a-kind, our stickers are perfect for laptops, water bottles, notebooks, and more. Stand out from the crowd with custom designs that reflect your style—order now and let your creativity stick! Priced between 250-400 Tl and send by an envelope. Shipping fees may be applied. Here is a sample file of my first Turkey Collection:

item.title: These Handmade Friendship Bracelets Are Taking Over Istanbul 2025!
item.description:
In a world that often feels vast and disconnected, NDesignstudio brings people closer together—one bracelet at a time. Founded by the creative visionary Nemah Alsayed, NDesignstudio specializes in handcrafted friendship bracelets that are more than just accessories; they are wearable stories, symbols of unity, and celebrations of global diversity.

Each bracelet is meticulously crafted with beads and threads, carefully chosen to represent the unique colors and cultural DNA of countries around the world. Whether it’s the vibrant hues of Mexico, the serene tones of Scandinavia, or the bold patterns of Africa, every piece tells a story. But that’s not all—Nemah adds a personal touch by including inspirational stickers and quotes with every purchase, making these bracelets not just a gift, but a meaningful experience.
